ModMetaData.name: Ethel Plush - Meme Furniture
ModMetaData.author: BrainCat
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the Ethel Plush, a divine meme furniture that randomly emits blessed sounds and encourages your colonists with temporary buffs.
Features: - Craftable furniture made from cloth - Randomly plays meme sounds - Grants mood, work speed, and movement buffs to colonists - Beautiful +15 decoration
"May the divine meow guide your colony to prosperity!"
